original_text:
“Does it make you a king
    to have more and more cedar?
Did not your father have food and drink?
    He did what was right and just,
    so all went well with him.
korean_text: 네가 백향목을 많이 사용하여 왕이 될 수 있겠느냐 네 아버지가 먹거나 마시지 아니하였으며 정의와 공의를 행하지 아니하였느냐 그 때에 그가 형통하였었느니라

sentences.original_text: Does it make you a king
to have more and more cedar?
sentences.korean_translation: 점점 더 많은 백향목을 갖는 것이요?

sentences.original_text: Did not your father have food and drink?
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 아버지는 먹을 것과 마실 것이 없었습니까?

sentences.original_text: He did what was right and just,
so all went well with him.
